p: The Shapiro–Wilks normality test, F-test for homogeneity of variance, Student’s t-test and Friedman test followed by Wilcoxon pairwise comparisons were performed by means of the PAleontological STatistics (PAST) statistical package [ 15]. Two-way ANOVA followed by Tukey’s test (only in cases with a normal variable and homogeneous variances) and box-plots were performed by means of StatSoft Statistica 8.0 (TIBCO Software, Palo Alto, CA, USA). Calculations were performed by means of Microsoft Excel (Redmond, Washington State, USA).
